featured.text: Sherlock Holmes, a detective in a popular fiction series, has impressed readers with his amazing powers of _____ and his knowledge of trivial facts.
Many workers want to wear casual clothes to impress people.
They were prized possessions made of expensive materials intended to impress guests.
What impressed Glenn most in the 1962 parade? (A)
When you show the picture to your friends afterwards, they’ll be impressed by your pet’s loving expression.

definition.zh_def: 使人留下深刻印象或感動。
definition.en_def: To make someone feel admiration or respect.
definition.example: Her performance was so amazing that it impressed everyone in the audience.
